client_mood_tracker_reminder_title: Don't Forget to Track Your Mood
client_mood_tracker_reminder_text:
Hello!

We noticed you haven't logged your mood this week. Tracking your emotional well-being regularly helps you better understand your mental health patterns and progress.

Take a moment to log your mood today by visiting: {1}

Your mental health matters!

Best regards,
uSupport Team
